hotels.vendor_name: An Lam Retreats Ninh Van Bay
hotels.title: Tranquil Five-Star Jungle Villa Retreat near Nha Trang with Private Beach
hotels.description: Escape to a secluded jungle paradise, where a pristine stretch of private beach and natural stream add to an ambience of absolute tranquility at An Lam Retreats Ninh Van Bay. This all-villa sanctuary is landscaped into sloping rainforest and fronted by glittering sea views for a magical escape. Located just a 20-minute scenic speedboat ride from Nha Trang, this secluded oasis is home to 37 luxurious timber villas decked out in eco-inspired furnishings, with most featuring a lavish private plunge pool. Spend sun-kissed days on the exclusive beachfront, transcend into a state of bliss at Jungle Spa and savour local seafood favourites amid the architectural splendour of Sen Restaurant. Afterwards, wind up the stairs to Sen Deck and bathe in bay vistas and sunset hues with a cocktail in hand. Engage with nature through a range of activities: find serenity on a hike through the stream-laced hinterland, explore the bay by kayak or learn how to catch mackerel and wrasse like a local on a unique fishing excursion.

hotels.title: Vietnam Six Senses Private Pool Villas within Private Ninh Van Bay Peninsula
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate secluded romantic escape with Six Senses Ninh Van Bay, the five-star, multi-award-winning property located along a private cove across the bay from Nha Trang. Accessible only by speedboat, this resort was designed with privacy in mind, making it the perfect haven for honeymooners looking to start married life relaxed and rejuvenated. Villas, complete with private pools and wine cellars, are spread far and wide with secret access points, meaning you'll rarely see another soul during your stay. Use golf buggies to zip around between yoga classes, treatments at the jungle-clad spa and active sessions at the outdoor gym or tennis courts. Be wined and dined between five incredible restaurants, while a poolside bar and infinity pool are the perfect place to enjoy a sunset cocktail and a swim.
